title: Cacheable Overlay Manager RISC-V
abstract: We would like to present and overlay technique for RISCV which will be open source by WD. This FW feature acts as and “catchable” manager. It is to be threaded with the Real-Time code and to the toolchain. Cacheable Overlay Manager RISC-V (ComRV), a technique which fits small devices (as IoT’s), and does not need any HW support.
